comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I was a big fan of FortuneJack's Champions League and Premier League promotions in the beginning, but eventually I lost interest in submitting my predictions every week. This time it's a bit different. It's not a tournament that lasts throughout the entire football season. It's just one month, and then we are done. I am glad they decided to create something for the World Cup as well. I am definitely going to check it out.
